title: Lintlha tsa Tekheniki - Tempele ea Orbital
heading: Lintlha tsa Tekheniki

satellite.heading: Sathelaete
satellite.specs:
Litekanyo: 50x58x64 limilimithara
1P PocketQube
Boima ba 'mele: 245 gr
Lisebelisoa: aluminium, khauta, fiberglass le likarolo tsa elektroniki.
Orbit: Bophahamo ba 525 ± 25 km; tšekamelo: SSO 97.6 ± 0.1°
Launcher: PSLV (Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle) e tsamaisoa ke ISRO

antenna.heading: Lenakana/ Setsoantso
antenna.specs:
Litekanyo: 6 m (bophara) le 1.2m (bolelele)
Boima ba 'mele: 46 lik'hilograma
Lisebelisoa: aluminium, boto ea seipone ea epoxy, dome ea khauta ea aluminium e emisitsoeng ka sebopeho sa scaffolding.

radio.heading: Lintlha tsa Radio
radio.specs:
Khokahano e tlase: 468.5 MHz
Ho feto-fetoha ha molumo oa lentsoe: CSS
Bophahamo ba moeli: TBD
